page.title: 15BROADMEADOW SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: Broadmeadow sports centre was opened in 1977. This year, 1985, the centre has undergone some major changes. Squash courts and a body building gymnasium have been added. Also a spacious lounge is planned which will later have a bar. The centre does lots of sports including hockey, volley-ball, tennis, football, badminton and netball. The competitions take place at the sports centre each year. A badminton tournament takes place inside while outside there is a cross-country run. A disabled sports day is planned for June. There is a very small path leading from Kingsway to the centre and people from the town have trouble getting to Broadmeadow if they have not got a car. Since there is only a small car park, cars often park on the road.
